params.amount: The amount of tokens to borrow

params._priceFeed: The Chainlink ETH/USD price feed address
params._stableToken: The ERC20 token users borrow (e.g., SolichainToken)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

borrow(uint256).notice: Borrows stable tokens against ETH collateral

constructor.notice: Initializes the vault with a stable token and Chainlink price feed.

getLTV(address).notice: Gets current LTV of a user

liquidate(address).notice: Liquidates user position if LTV exceeds threshold

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraws ETH collateral, ensuring LTV is safe
